text: Novaya Aldashla () is a rural locality (a village) in Tashlinsky Selsoviet, Gafuriysky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 3 as of 2010. There are 2streets. == Geography == It is located 19 km from Krasnousolsky, 7 km from Tashla. == References == Category:Rural localities in Gafuriysky District
title: Novaya Aldashla
